title: Boring Blockchain Conference Before Bed
description:
On today's episode of Sleep & Relax ASMR, we sit in on the annual Boring Blockchain Conference, where we learn about blockchain, uses of the technology, NFTs, and we give you a little inside access to some art work you can get your hands on before anyone else. Enjoy!

---

For more information on Sleep and Relax ASMR's NFT collection, visit https://xtingles.com/ or email us at Hello@SleepandRelaxAMR.com
